title: Health (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 19 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed 
Payment Notice and Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) 
(No. 3) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 24th day of 

December 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (fixed payment notice dwelling event provisions) (covid-19) (amendment) (no 3) regulation 2020 (2) regulation shall come operation 24th day december 2020

title: Health (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 19 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No.
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and Dwelling Event
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and Dwelling Event 
Provisions) (Covid -19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 536 of 2020) are amended, 
in Schedule 1, by the substitution in column 2 of paragraph 6 of “Regulation 
7(1) of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (No. 9) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 560 of 2020) (amended by Regulation 7 
of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(No. 9) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 695 of 2020))” for 
“Regulation 7(2) of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 9) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 560 of 2020)”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [697] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 December, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [697]

title: Health (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 19 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and 
Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 536 of 2020) to 
provide for certain penal provisions in the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 9) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 695 of 2020) to be fixed penalty and/or dwelling event 
provisions. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [697] 5
